content: 88 3 single_crochet around 88 f/o leave long tail for sewing 2 large half-circles make one in light purple and one in dark purple 1 chain 2 3 single_crochet in 1st chain 3 2 chain 1 turn increase across 6 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet increase across 9 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet increase until one stitch remains single_crochet 13 f/o leave long tail for sewing 3 small half-circles make one in light purple and two in dark purple 1 chain 2 3 single_crochet in 1st chain 3 2 chain 1 turn increase across 6 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet increase across 9 f/o leave long tail for sewing © icrochetthings 2014-2016 2 small horns starting with light purple 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 increase around 12 3 5 5 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet decrease 12 6 8 5 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet increase 12 stuff 9 decrease around 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing 2 large horns starting with dark purple 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 increase around 12 3 5 5 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet decrease 12 6 8 single_crochet around 12 9 11 5 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet increase 12 stuff 12 decrease around 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing © icrochetthings 2014-2016 assembly see pictures on next page if you need help with placement ▪ use black yarn to embroider eyes onto the head ▪ sew the large dark-purple half-circle onto the body facing up ▪ sew the large light-purple half-circle onto the body to the right of the other large half-circle facing down ▪ sew the large spots on either side of the mouth ▪ sew a small dark-purple half-circle next to both of the large spots facing up ▪ sew the small spots next to the small dark-purple half-circles ▪ sew the small light-purple half-circle in-between the small spots facing down ▪ sew the slime around the bottom of the body making sure the largest section is in the back ▪ sew the small horns onto the top of the head ▪ sew the large horns onto the top of the head behind the small horns © icrochetthings 2014-2016 © icrochetthings 2014-2016
